column2: "The speed of jumping up and down is so fast and there is little thing to do through jumping. The levels are simple and interesting."
"Loading is tooo slow"
"有些金币吃不到"
"too many enemies"

"1. Some monsters in some levels are stuck by bug.
2. Some scenes in some levels cannot be passed.

However
"1. Sometimes the level is unplayable. For example
"too long for each play and nearly forget the previous one when doing rank"
"马里奥操纵起来有些迟钝，当我去尝试击杀一些敌人的时候，很容易就死亡了。\n就关卡而言，有两个地图的坑太宽了，为了通过这坑 不得不去消耗一条命，很打击积极性。而且坑之上可能有砖块但是也几乎不可能去达到"
"惯性和重力加速度不好控制，虽然更真实，但很难操控。\n乌龟壳跑太快了。"
"The Mario game requires pressing the bullet button to move in order to accelerate. Now
"no"
"Apart from the map
"蘑菇，花，敌人有些分布不均，有些裂缝无法通过跳跃通过"
"The controls are not always very responsive."
"Having WASD as jump;left;duck;right and shift for running would have felt more natural (to me) for controls. It definitely contributed to some deaths in the game.\n"
"there are some bugs happen for the turtles"

"Interesting."
